com.intel.fightclub.cloud.preferences

Class CloudPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.cloud.preferences.CloudPreferences

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class CloudPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles shared preferences that are associated with the cloud.

                                            android.content.Context context,
                                            @NonNull
                                            CompletableTask taskType)
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        taskType - The task to get the upload interval for.

      • saveUploadIntervalForTask

        public static void saveUploadIntervalForTask(@NonNull
                                             android.content.Context context,
                                             @NonNull
                                             CompletableTask taskType,
                                             long interval)
        Saves the provided upload interval for a specific task to shared preferences.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        taskType - The upload task.
        interval - The upload interval (in seconds) to set for the task.
